page.description: Create a new spreadsheet from a SQL::ResultSet and add it to the document.
page.prototype: .AddSheetFromResultSet as Office::Spreadsheet (ResultSet as SQL::ResultSet, SheetName as C [, IncludeHeadings as L [, RowsToCopy as N [, StartRow as N [, ReferenceColumns as P [, UserContext as P]]]]])

argument.name: ResultSet
argument.description: The result set for a SQL query that contains the data to add to the spreadsheet.

argument.name: IncludeHeadings
argument.description: Default = .T.. If *[xb:.T.]*, headings will be included in the spreadsheet.

argument.name: RowsToCopy
argument.description: Default = -1. The number of rows to copy. If -1, all rows will be copied.

argument.name: StartRow
argument.description: Default = -1. The first row to copy.

argument.name: ReferenceColumns
argument.description: Default = null_value(). Specify advanced data transformations using a SQL::TableInfo object.

argument.name: UserContext
argument.description: Default = null_value(). A context object used to perform advanced data transformations.
